SEARCH
Package HMS.src.authorisation

Interface IPasswordManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
PasswordManager
public interface IPasswordManager
Interface defining the core password management operations in the HMS system. Follows the Interface Segregation Principle by providing focused password-related operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    authenticate(String userId, String hashedPassword)
    Authenticates the user with the given userId and hashed password.
    void
    changePassword()
    Changes the password of the currently logged in user.
    String
    getPassword(String prompt)
    Prompts the user to enter a password with the given prompt.
    String
    hashPassword(String password)
    Hashes the given password using a secure hashing algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      void changePassword()
      Changes the password of the currently logged in user.

    • authenticate

      boolean authenticate(String userId, String hashedPassword)
      Authenticates the user with the given userId and hashed password.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID to authenticate
      hashedPassword - The hashed password to verify
      Returns:
      true if authentication successful, false otherwise

    • getPassword

      String getPassword(String prompt)
      Prompts the user to enter a password with the given prompt.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The prompt to display to the user
      Returns:
      The entered password

    • hashPassword

      String hashPassword(String password)
      Hashes the given password using a secure hashing algorithm.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to hash
      Returns:
      The hashed password
